quotes.quote: Whenever I counted on someone, I ended up getting hurt.
Yes, it reallyï»¿ was a fairy tale. A pretty girl reached out her hand to me and ... told me to die!
You may come to a standstill or get irritated because things don't work out the way you want them to, but what you gain from hard work will never betray you.
Isn't it lonely when you wake up and you don't hear any voices?
Ruin Myself, huh? I like it.
*to Ohana* You can't do everything by yourself!... But I can't do it by myself, either. I need your help.
